weekly_top_story.headline: HHS Announces New Actions to Improve Long COVID Care
weekly_top_story.summary: The Department of Health and Human Services revealed multiple initiatives including educational campaigns and a new online platform to enhance clinical care and research sharing for long COVID patients, addressing an ongoing public health challenge.

stories.headline: FDA Issues Global Recall of Olympus ViziShot 2 FLEX Needles
stories.summary: The FDA announced a global recall of Olympus ViziShot 2 FLEX needles manufactured before May 12 due to safety concerns, critical for providers using these devices in diagnostic procedures.

stories.headline: ACIP Recommends Patients Consult Providers on COVID-19 Booster
stories.summary: The Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices advised individuals to consult healthcare providers regarding their COVID-19 booster eligibility amid ongoing changes in vaccine recommendations.

stories.headline: FDA Identifies Class I Recall for Mo-Vis BVBA R-net Joysticks
stories.summary: Due to a firmware error causing wheelchair joystick malfunctions, the FDA classified a recall for Mo-Vis BVBA R-net products as Class I, representing the highest risk level for patient safety.
